type: Reconditionnement de disjoncteurs de type Westinghouse DSL-416 et DSL-208 - NGCC Pierre Radisson
department: Departement des travaux publics et Service gouvernementaux (PSPC)
short_summary: Procurement Services will be acquiring the acquisition of a complete upgrade and reconditioning of cireuit  breakers located on the CCGS Radisson.
description: Reinforcing the safety of CCGS Pierre  Radisson through the procurement of a priority service to replace and recondition wire and electrical components.
